contraindication.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has had an adverse reaction to a vaccine component.

contraindication.observationTitle: Severe allergic reaction after previous dose of Japanese Encephalitis
contraindication.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has had a severe allergic reaction after a previous dose of Japanese Encephalitis vaccine.

contraindication.observationTitle: Severe allergic reaction to protamine sulfate
contraindication.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has had a severe allergic reaction to protamine sulfate.
